text:
Hello all,
I am trying to fetch the image property of product that i have generated own my own with Hubl.

 {% set contact = crm_object("product",contacts.id, 'id,price,createdate,name,prod_image, description') %}

I am able to retrieve it with above code but its only available for my 10 products. Then i tried this,
{% set product = crm_objects("product","limit="+product_count+",'id,price,createdate,name,prod_image, description'") %}

I don't see any prod_image property in my products with above syntax.

Please help me out !
Any suggestion is welcome .

Thanks!
The syntax for string concatenation in HubL is ~ not +
<@U01P4LMBA10> thaaanks man I will try that
Anyone else having problems with the get_asset_url() function today? it doesn't seem to be working and it was previously...

<@U9KA594Q3> Thanks for pointing it out but still i am unable to fetch all products with custom properties. my products are just showing four properties .Price ,name,id and create date.(for some product description also but not prod_image) how can i fetch the custom properties like prod_image from it.
<https://prnt.sc/10jdmix>
All good for me, try upading the cli
